I have many years of experience planning, developing and delivering technical trainings and workshops. Furthermore, I am speaker at international symposiums and author of numerous books, papers and articles.

work.summary: As Lab Services CTO for IBM Storage I'm developing and leading the EMEA team's strategic technical direction. I'm evaluating new technology trends to ensure that ~100 consultants' skills are aligned to support clients adapting emerging technologies in a dynamically-evolving space. I'm liaising with senior leadership to replicate best practices among 8 markets in Europe, Middle-East & Africa.

I am an expert on software defined storage and scale-out file solutions, with a strong background in open source technology. Furthermore, I am technical lead of the local group of specialists.
